Description:
Model
Brand: APC
Series: Back-UPS
Model: BE670M1


Input
International Version: 120V
Input Voltage Range: 92 - 139V
Input Frequency: 50/60 Hz +/- 3 Hz (auto sensing)
Input Connection: NEMA 5-15P


Output
VA Rating: 675VA
Watts: 360 Watts
Output Voltage: 120V
Output Frequency: 50/60 Hz +/- 3 Hz
Outlets: 7
Outlet Type: 2 x NEMA 5-15R (Surge Protection)
5 x NEMA 5-15R (Battery Backup)


Battery
Battery Type: Lead Acid Battery
Battery Run Time: 360W: 2.5 min
Battery Recharge Time: 10 Hour(s)


Details
Alarms: Alarm when on battery: distinctive low battery alarm: overload continuous tone alarm
Interface Port: USB
Approvals: California Energy Commission (CEC), CTUVus, NOM, UL 1778, RoHS


Surge Protection
Surge Energy Rating: 490 Joules


Features
Features: Adjustable voltage sensitivity: Provides the ability to adapt the UPS for optimal performance in specific power environments or generator applications.

Audible alarms: Provides notification of changing utility power and UPS power conditions.

Automatic self-test: Periodic battery self-test ensures early detection of a battery that needs to be replaced.

Battery failure notification: Provides early-warning fault analysis on batteries enabling timely preventive maintenance.

Building Wiring Fault Indicator: This LED informs users of potentially dangerous wiring problems in the wall circuit.

Cold-start capable: Provides temporary battery power when the utility power is out.

Disconnected battery notification: Warns when a battery is not available to provide backup power.

Hot-swappable batteries: Ensures clean, uninterrupted power to protected equipment while batteries are being replaced.


Simple battery replacement: Increases UPS availability by allowing quick, easy battery replacement.

Transformer Block Spacing: Connect bulky transformer block plugs without covering up other outlets.

USB connectivity: Provides management of the UPS via a USB port (not available on all models).


Dimensions & Weight
Dimensions: 5.47" x 10.80" x 4.13"
Weight: 7.70 lbs.


Package Contents
Package Contents: APC Back-UPS BE670M1
